title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Meet Walker’s Razor Slim Earmuffs — clear hearing when you want it, protection when you need it.

Simple benefits you’ll notice right away:
- Protects your ears from loud gunshots with 23 dB noise reduction.
- Lets you hear voices and range commands clearly with two built‑in microphones.
- Reacts fast to sudden loud sounds in just 0.02 seconds to keep you comfortable.
- Each ear has its own easy-to-turn recessed volume knob, so you can set sound just right.
- Soft, comfortable headband with a sturdy metal wire frame; fits most heads without pinching.
- Slim, foldable design for easy storage in a bag or drawer.
- Lightweight at under 1 pound, so it won’t feel heavy on your head.

Easy to use:
1) Insert the two included AAA batteries.
2) Place the muffs over your ears and adjust the headband for comfort.
3) Turn the volume knobs to hear speech and range commands.
4) When shots happen, the earmuffs automatically reduce the loud noise.
5) Done for the day? Fold them up and store them.

Helpful extras:
- High‑definition speakers for clearer sound.
- Audio input jack if you want to plug in a device for guided training or audio.
- Durable composite housing designed to dampen sound and last.

Size and weight:
- About 8.1 inches long, 4.6 inches wide, 10.6 inches high.
- Weighs about 0.98 pounds.

If you want easy, comfortable, and dependable hearing protection at the range without missing important voices, Walker’s Razor Slim Earmuffs are a smart, worry‑free choice.
